english.segment3: Bring, Me your time, How I long, For release, Shown, Presently, Reveals a man, To repeat.
english.segment4: God, How I long, How I long, To grab thy hand and LOOK!!!
english.segment5: May I, Come in, Grab hold, Just this once, May I, Come in, Just this once, Just this once, Just this once.
english.segment9: May I, Come and, How long, Just once, Can't I, Come and, Grab thy hand and, May I (through), Come and, How long, Just once, Can't I (through), Come and, Grab thy hand and, LOOK!!! (Through) (4x)
